args.canonical_rel_desc: Indicates that the subject uses the object as an instrument or means, with any specific purposes or aims expressed via qualifiers or separate relations.
args.justification: In this instance, the subject (societies) is the agent and the object (sports) is the instrument. The current canonical_rel_name 'uses_for' misleadingly suggests the object is the purpose, whereas the actual purposes appear in qualifiers (e.g., challenging stereotypes, promoting gender equality). Renaming the predicate to 'uses' better captures the agent–instrument semantics while keeping it within the instrumental_use_relation class and USAGE group.
